CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 25, 1947, pg. 10, reads: "Pretty Wedding - One of the pretty winter weddings was that of Miss Hattie Sammons, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. March Sammons of Aonco, and Shelly Hurt, son of Mr. and Mrs. Franklin Hurt, on Dec. 22. The bride was given in marriage by Dr. I. W. Cornelius. Bishop Harris officiated. In the bridal party were Al Lewis, best man; Julia Sammons, maid of honor; Evelyn Fowler, bridesmaid, and Sydney Lewis, usher. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Groom Shelly Hurt, and bride Hattie Sammons wearing gown with sweetheart neckline, surrounded by wedding party including Al Lewis, Julia Sammons, Evelyn Fowler, and Sydney Lewis, in domestic interior with leaf patterned curtains
